Initializer# init(cellularServiceID:handle:cachePolicy:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst

```
init(
    cellularServiceID: CellularServiceID,
    handle: RCSHandle.URI,
    cachePolicy: RCSService.BusinessInformationRequest.CachePolicy = .cacheOrRemote
)
```
